exploreUrl:
<js>
function setArgument(key, value) {
    var open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument, '') || {};
    open_argument[key] = value;
    var result = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(result);
    return result;
}

function getFanqieCookie() {
    try {
        return String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || '');
    } catch (e) {
        return '';
    }
}

var open_argument = source.getVariable();
var base_url = getArguments(open_argument, 'server') || '';
var ms = getArguments(open_argument, 'tone_id') || '';
var source_type = getArguments(open_argument, 'source_type') || 'ç”·é¢‘';
var tab = getArguments(open_argument, 'media') || 'å°è¯´';
var sources = getArguments(open_argument, 'source') || 'ç•ªèŒ„';


var sdtoken;
try {
    var loginInfoMap = source.getLoginInfoMap ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {};
    sdtoken = String(loginInfoMap['æ‰‹åŠ¨å¡«å†™ç•ªèŒ„token(å¯ä¸å¡«)'] || '');
} catch (e) {
    sdtoken = '';
}

var rawCookie = getFanqieCookie() || sdtoken;
var match = rawCookie.match(/sessionid=[^;]+/);
var fqcookie = match ? encodeURIComponent(match[0]) : '';
if (!fqcookie) {
    java.toast('æ‚¨è¿˜æœªç™»é™†ç•ªèŒ„è´¦å·ï¼Œæ— æ³•åŒæ­¥æ•°æ®å“¦ï¼');
    }
var fqsjurl = base_url + "/bookshelf?page={{page}}&cookie=" + fqcookie;

var groupDatas = [];
var infoData = [];

function deviceType() {
    try {
        return !!java.androidId();
    } catch (e) {
        return false;
    }
}

var device = deviceType() ? 'android' : 'ios';
var hasValidCookie = fqcookie.length > 0;

if (device === 'android' && hasValidCookie) {
    function groupQuery() {
        try {
            var url = base_url + "/group_name?cookie=" + fqcookie;
            var res = java.ajax(url);
            var response = JSON.parse(res);
            
            if (!(response && response.data)) {
                  }

            response.data.forEach(function(group) {
                var keys = Object.keys(group);
                if (keys.length > 0) {
                    var key = keys[0];
                    var value = group[key];
                    if (value && value.length) {
                    	var option = {
                             "method": "POST" ,
                             "body": {"book_ids":value,
                                            "page":"{{page}}"}
                             };
                            groupDatas.push({
                            title: key,
                            url: base_url + "/bookshelf3," + JSON.stringify(option),
                            style: {
                                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                                layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                            }
                        });
                    }
                }
            });

            if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
                groupDatas.push({
                    title: "--",
                    url: "",
                    style: {
                        layout_flexGrow: 1,
                        layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                    }
                });
            }
        } catch (e) {
            java.longToast("åˆ†ç»„è·å–å¤±è´¥: " + e.message);
                    }
    }

    try {
        java.longToast("æ­£åœ¨åŠ è½½åˆ†ç»„æ•°æ®...");
        var sessionid = match ? match[0] : '';
        var userUrl = base_url + "/fquser?" + sessionid;
        var userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
        var userData = JSON.parse(userRes);
        
        var userName = (userData && userData.data && userData.data.name) ? userData.data.name : 'æœªçŸ¥ç”¨æˆ·';
        infoData = [{
            title: userName + "ä¸ªäººä¸­å¿ƒ",
            url: fqsjurl,
            style: {
                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                layout_flexBasisPercent: 1
            }
        }];
        
        groupQuery();
    } catch (e) {
        java.longToast("æ“ä½œå¤±è´¥: " + e.message);
            }
}

var style_list = [];
try {
    var durl =  `${base_url}/discover_style?source=${sources}&source_type=${source_type}&tab=${tab}`;
    var res = java.ajax(durl);
    var result = JSON.parse(res);
    style_list = result.style_list || [];
    java.toast(result.msg);
} catch (e) {
    java.toast("å‘ç°æ ·å¼è·å–å¤±è´¥");
}

var finalData = infoData.concat(groupDatas, style_list);
JSON.stringify(finalData);
</js>

ğŸª„å¤§ç°ç‹¼è´¦å·ï¼š${key}
ğŸ´å½“å‰æ¥æºï¼š${sources}
ğŸ—‚å½“å‰æ¨¡å¼ï¼š${tab}\n`
if (tab =='å¬ä¹¦') {info = info+	'ğŸ”Šå½“å‰éŸ³è‰²ï¼š'+ getArguments(source.getVariable(),'tone_id')+'\n'+book_tts+'\n‎';}
if (`${tags}`) {info = info +  `ğŸ•¹åˆ†ç±»ï¼š${tags}\n`};
if (`${role}`) {info = info +  `ğŸ—ä¹¦ç±ä¸»è§’ï¼š${role}\n`};
if (`${last_chapter_title}`) {info = info +  `ğŸ¯æœ€æ–°ç« èŠ‚ï¼š${last_chapter_title}\n`};
if (`${last_chapter_update_time}`) {info = info +  `â³æ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´ï¼š${last_chapter_update_time}\n`};
if (`${word_number}`) {info = info +  `ğŸ“ä¹¦ç±å­—æ•°ï¼š${word_number}\n`};
if (`${status}`) {info = info +  `ğŸ’¥ä¹¦ç±çŠ¶æ€ï¼š${status}\n`};
if (`${score}`) {info = info +  `âœ¨ä¹¦ç±è¯„åˆ†ï¼š${score}\n`};
if (`${media}`) {info = info +  `ğŸ“Œå‡ºç‰ˆåª’ä½“ï¼š${media}\n`};
if (`${abstract}`) {info = info +  `‎
ğŸ“šä¹¦ç±ç®€ä»‹ï¼š
${abstract}\n`};

 let data = java.ajax(base_url+content_url);

if (JSON.parse(data).msg) {

data = JSON.parse(data);

let sources = result.source;
let title = result.title;
let item_id = result.item_id;

let content_url = `${item_id}å¤§ç°ç‹¼èåˆ2.1${tab}å¤§ç°ç‹¼èåˆ2.1${title}å¤§ç°ç‹¼èåˆ2.1${sources}`;

</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'server');
let key2 = '';
try {
	key2 = String(cookie.getCookie(base_url)) || String(java.getCookie(base_url));
	key2 = getKey(key2);
        } catch (e) {key2='';}


let media;
let sources = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'source');
if (String(key).startsWith("m:")||String(key).startsWith("mï¼š")) {
  media = "æ¼«ç”»"
  key = key.slice(2)
  }else if (String(key).startsWith("t:")||String(key).startsWith("tï¼š")) {
  media = "å¬ä¹¦"
  key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("d:")||String(key).startsWith("dï¼š")) {
  media = "çŸ­å‰§"
  key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("x:")||String(key).startsWith("xï¼š"))  {
	media = "å°è¯´"
  key = key.slice(2)
	} else {
	media = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'media');
	}
if (key.includes('@')) {
  const parts = key.split('@');
  key = parts[0];
  sources = parts[1] || sources;
}
	`${base_url}/search?title=${key}&tab=${media}&source=${sources}&key=${key2}`
</js>
